Package org.example.Logic.Model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
org.example.Logic.Model.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class represents the game board. The board consists of a hexagonal grid of tiles (Hexagons). It also contains lists of sharks and whales present on the board.
